title: 2. Layouts
content:
Each layout is a collection of rows and columns that defines a location for target content to be placed. A layout can have the following attributes defined for it:

Attribute NameAttribute Value
rowsArray of vertical blocks that can contain column objects
columnsArray of horizontal blocks that contains an object with the following properties:

NameDescription
idName of a block that can contain content
nameDOM name of the generated object
styleCSS style that is applied to the block
